title: Motion & Animation Tokens

codeBlocks.code:
<motion.button
  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02, y: -2 }}
  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
  transition={{ type: 'spring', stiffness: 300 }}
>
  Hover me
</motion.button>

<motion.div
  variants={containerVariants}
  initial="hidden"
  animate="visible"
>
  {items.map((item) => (
    <motion.div key={item.id} variants={itemVariants}>
      {item.content}
    </motion.div>
  ))}
</motion.div>

const containerVariants = {
  hidden: { opacity: 0 },
  visible: {
    opacity: 1,
    transition: {
      staggerChildren: 0.1
    }
  }
};

const itemVariants = {
  hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 },
  visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }
};
